default_full.js

  • opal/stdlib/nodejs/node_modules/js-yaml/lib/js-yaml/schema/default_full.js
  • Last modified: 2015-08-29 16:13:52 +0200

// JS-YAML's default schema for `load` function. // It is not described in the YAML specification. // // This schema is based on JS-YAML's default safe schema and includes // JavaScript-specific types: !!js/undefined, !!js/regexp and !!js/function. // // Also this schema is used as default base schema at `Schema.create` function.

'use strict';

var Schema = require('../schema');

module.exports = Schema.DEFAULT = new Schema({

include: [
  require('./default_safe')
],
explicit: [
  require('../type/js/undefined'),
  require('../type/js/regexp'),
  require('../type/js/function')
]

});
